about.title: TrueLife • Support Armenia
about.description:
TrueLife-ը հարթակ է, որտեղ հայերը միավորվում են՝ պահպանելու մեր մշակույթը, կիսվելու գաղափարներով և մասնակցելու ինչպես անձնական, այնպես էլ առցանց հանդիպումների։

Դառնալով անդամ՝ դուք նպաստում եք մեր գաղափարների զարգացմանը և առաջ մղմանը,
ամրապնդում եք կապը ամբողջ աշխարհի հայերի միջև,
և դառնում եք միասնական և ստեղծագործ համայնքի մաս։

Միասին մենք կառուցում ենք ուժեղ, ներդաշնակ և առաջ շարժվող հայկական միջավայր։

membership.purchasedBanner: Անդամակցությունը գնվել է։ Մենք կշարունակենք պատվերի մշակումը։

card.title: Անդամակցության քարտ
card.details: Լրացրեք տվյալները և վճարեք Stripe-ում՝ ֆիզիկական քարտը ստանալու համար։

full.title: Լիարժեք փաթեթ
full.details: Լրացրեք տվյալները և վճարեք Stripe-ում՝ փաստաթղթերի ու հավելյալ նյութերի փաթեթը ստանալու համար։

orders.updateNote: Վճարումից հետո թարմացնում ենք ֆիզիկական առաքումների կարգավիճակները․
orders.empty: Դեռ չունեք žád žád žád հայտեր։

snack.needSubscription: Այս ապրանքը գնելու համար անհրաժեշտ է ակտիվ բաժանորդագրություն։

events.title: Միջոցառումներ
events.lockedBanner: Դարձեք անդամ՝ բոլոր մանրամասները բացելու համար։

home.title: Այսօրվա պատմությունները
home.lockedBanner: Դարձեք անդամ՝ բոլոր պատմությունները բացելու համար։

membershipForm.title: Անդամակցության տվյալներ
membershipForm.intro: Նախ լրացրեք ձեր տվյալները։ Դրանից հետո դուք կուղղորդվեք Stripe՝ անդամակցության քարտի վճարման համար։
membershipForm.stripeNote: Վճարումը անվտանգ մշակվում է Stripe-ի կողմից։

privacyPolicy:
TrueLife LLC — Full Legal Policy Package (Membership Subscription Service)
Effective Date: 01/01/2015
Jurisdiction: United States, State of California, Los Angeles County
Business Type: Limited Liability Company (LLC)
Service Type: Membership Subscription (Online + In‑Person Events)
Company: TrueLife LLC
Contact: 
Address: 400 N Brand Blvd., Glendale CA 91203


1. PRIVACY POLICY
(Complies with California Consumer Privacy Act — CCPA/CPRA)

1.1. Data Controller
The data controller responsible for personal information processed through TrueLife services is TrueLife LLC, a limited liability company registered in Los Angeles, California.

1.2. Information We Collect
Personal Information:
- Full name
- Email address
- Phone number (optional)
- Age confirmation (18+)
- Mailing address (for sending membership cards)
- Region/country of residence

Membership Information:
- Subscription status
- Membership level
- Attendance at events or meetings
- Delivery status of membership cards

Sensitive Information (Voluntary Only):
- Cultural or ethnic background
- Community interests
- Information voluntarily shared during membership communication

Technical Information:
- IP address
- Cookies and analytics
- Device/browser metadata

1.3. How We Use Your Information
We use personal information to:
- Provide access to membership services
- Deliver membership cards (digital/physical)
- Register members for online and in‑person meetings
- Send updates, newsletters, and internal announcements
- Manage and verify subscription status
- Ensure community safety and compliance
- Improve digital platform performance

1.4. No Sale of Data
TrueLife LLC does not sell or trade personal data to third parties.

1.5. Legal Basis for Processing
- Member consent
- Contract fulfillment (membership agreement)
- Compliance with California business law
- Platform security and fraud prevention

1.6. Data Retention
- Membership data: retained while subscription is active
- Communications: up to 2 years
- Technical logs: 1 year
- Physical card delivery data: deleted after shipment confirmation
- Sensitive information: deleted upon request

1.7. Member Rights (CCPA/CPRA)
Members have the right to:
- Request access to collected information
- Request deletion of personal data
- Correct inaccurate information
- Withdraw consent
- Opt-out of analytics cookies
- Know if data is shared with service providers (e.g., mailing services)

Requests are processed within 45 days.

1.8. Data Security
TrueLife LLC implements:
- SSL/TLS encryption
- Encrypted storage for sensitive fields
- Access limitation for internal personnel
- Regular security reviews
- Breach notification procedures required by law

2. TERMS OF SERVICE (Membership Agreement)

2.1. Age Requirement
Members must be 18 years old or older.

2.2. Nature of the Service
TrueLife LLC provides a membership subscription service offering:
- Access to community news and internal updates
- Participation in online meetings
- Participation in in‑person gatherings and events
- Issuance of a digital or physical membership card
- Community networking opportunities
- Cultural and social engagement programs

2.3. Subscription & Billing
- Membership is billed automatically (monthly or yearly)
- Members may cancel anytime through their account or app settings
- Access remains active until the end of the paid period
- Subscription fees are non‑refundable except where required by California Auto‑Renewal Law (ARL)

2.4. Delivery of Membership Cards
- Digital membership cards are provided instantly upon subscription
- Physical cards (if applicable) are shipped to the member’s address
- Delivery times vary based on region

2.5. Prohibited Conduct
Members must not:
- Engage in harassment or violence
- Disrupt events or meetings
- Use TrueLife for political, extremist, or illegal activities
- Impersonate other members
- Damage community reputation
- Violate safety rules at in‑person gatherings

2.6. In‑Person Event Liability
Members acknowledge that:
- Participation in physical events is voluntary
- Members are responsible for their own conduct
- TrueLife LLC is not liable for personal injury, loss, theft, or misconduct of other attendees
- Members must follow venue rules and local laws
- TrueLife may remove any participant violating safety guidelines

2.7. No Professional Services
TrueLife LLC does not provide:
- Legal representation
- Immigration/asylum processing
- Medical or psychiatric treatment
- Financial services

2.8. Termination
TrueLife LLC reserves the right to suspend or terminate a membership for:
- Repeated violations of community rules
- Safety concerns at events
- Fraudulent activity
- Abuse of the membership system

2.9. Governing Law
These Terms are governed by California state law. All disputes fall under Los Angeles County jurisdiction.

3. REFUND & CANCELLATION POLICY (Required by CA Auto‑Renewal Law)

3.1. Subscription Billing
- Membership renews automatically unless canceled.
- Renewal frequency is clearly disclosed during sign-up.

3.2. Cancellations
Members may cancel through:
- Account settings
- Email request to customer support

3.3. Refunds
Refunds are granted only if:
- There was an accidental duplicate charge
- A billing error occurred
- Required by California consumer protection law

Otherwise, subscription fees are non-refundable.

3.4. Confirmation
Upon subscribing, members receive:
- Clear billing confirmation
- Renewal schedule
- Cancellation instructions

4. CONSENT STATEMENTS (For UI)

1. I confirm I am at least 18 years old and agree to TrueLife LLC’s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
2. I understand that TrueLife LLC is a membership subscription service providing digital and in‑person community access.
3. I consent to the processing of my data for membership verification, communication, and event participation.
4. I understand that my subscription renews automatically unless canceled.

5. CONTACT INFORMATION

TrueLife LLC
Los Angeles, California, USA
Email: 
Address: 400 N Brand Blvd., Glendale CA 91203
Website: truelifeapp.org
